1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Ed,
It was a pleasure speaking with you today. I’ve enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful:
This interactive tool shows the value of using a company like MBO Partners as an alternative to incorporation: http://www.mbopartners.com/#whoweareLink to a summary of the value of using MBO Partners: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/Welcome_to_MBO_Partners.pdfYou also can browse through the group benefits you would have access to here: http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-exec-group-benefits-2012 Here’s our full Expense Policy: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Expense_Policy.pdf There are some webinars and videos we have created that might assist you in finding your next contract:http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index You may also look at some of the stories from independents who use MBO Partners:http://info.mbopartners.com/meet-the-independents.html · For more information on MBO Partners for your client’s click here: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf
As I mentioned, once you find your next contract we can do a financial illustration showing what your income could look like when using MBO Partners as your business vehicle. Best of luck finding your next contract and I’ll follow up with you as promised. If you have questions before then, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule: https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
Have a great day and I look forward to speaking with you again soon!
Thank you, Nicolette
